derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English līm, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch lijm, German Leim, also to loam
mid 17th cent.: from French, from modern Provençal limo, Spanish lima, from Arabic līma; compare with lemon
early 17th cent.: alteration of obsolete line, from Old English lind (see linden)
origin uncertain; said to be from Limey (because of the number of British sailors present during the Second World War), or from suck a lime, expressing bitterness at not being invited to a gathering

encyclopedia.content: 简介 LIME是一个使用类似 LISP 语法的动态编程语言 。它开始了作为一个LISP的最小的子集，并迅速成立了几个新功能，使不同的编程风格。 版本发布 2012年04月26日，LIME 1.6 发布，增加了可变的算术运算符和部分宏应用。 2012年04月28日，LIME 1.9 发布，该版本引入一些可变的函数和宏。 2012年04月30日，LIME 1.10 发布了，此版本修复了在宏扩展的错误。 特点 部分功能的应用。 呼叫值语义和渴望的评价作为默认。 可选的，明确的

entry.def: A lime is a green fruit that tastes like a lemon. Limes grow on trees in tropical countries.

example.ex: Oranges, lemons and limes were found to cure scurvy...
example.tran: 人们发现橙子、柠檬和酸橙能治疗坏血病。

entry.def: Lime is a drink that tastes of limes.
A lime is a large tree with pale green leaves. It is often planted in parks in towns and cities.

example.tran: 破败不堪的欧椴树林阴道

entry.def: Lime is a substance containing calcium. It is found in soil and water.

example.ex: If your soil is very acid, add lime.
example.tran: 如果土壤酸性太强，就加些石灰。

means.word_mean: 1. a caustic substance produced by heating limestone
2. a white crystalline oxide used in the production of calcium hydroxide
3. a sticky adhesive that is smeared on small branches to capture small birds
4. any of various related trees bearing limes
5. any of various deciduous trees of the genus Tilia with heart-shaped leaves and drooping cymose clusters of yellowish often fragrant flowers; several yield valuable timber
6. the green acidic fruit of any of various lime trees
1. spread birdlime on branches to catch birds
2. cover with lime so as to induce growth;

Sentence.sentence: For a start, all animals, such as cows, pigs and sheep, always gas limed methane, which is the second most common green house gas after carbon dioxide.
Similarly, some couples don't have children because they don't want to sacrifice their own lifestyles to the lime and expense of a family.

sentences.en: A broad avenue of lime trees led up to a grand entrance with huge oak doors.
sentences.cn: 一条栽有酸橙树的宽阔林阴道通向巨大的橡木门的雄伟入口。

sentences.en: Serve the dish garnished with wedges of lime.
sentences.cn: 给这道菜配上几角酸橙。

sentences.en: The gas has been tested with lime water.
sentences.cn: 已经用石灰水对该气体进行了检验。

sentences.en: Acidity in soil can be neutralized by spreading lime on it.
sentences.cn: 土壤的酸性可以通过在它上面撒石灰来中和。
许多土壤中都含有石灰。
